name: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade 2002: Ikuze! Bakutou! Chou Jiryoku Battle!!
summary: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade 2002: Ikuze! Gekitou! Chou Jiryoku Battle!! is an Action game, developed by AI and published by Broccoli, which was released in Japan in 2002.
